ProgramServiceAccomplishment.DescriptionProgramServiceAccom: DURING 2010, IMH MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL INC SPONSORED 12 SERVICE PROJECTS IN 7 DIFFERENT COMMUNITIES AROUND THE USA AND SPONSORED 1 PROJECT IN QUITO, ECUADOR. WE HAD TEAM MEMBERS FROM 8 DIFFEENT STATES. OUR DOMESTIC SERVICE PROJECTS LAST A DURATION OF 6 DAYS. OUR INTERNATIONAL SERVICE PROJECTS SERVE A DURATION OF BETWEEN 9 AND 10 DAYS BASED ON TRAVEL AND EXPENSE. WE SERVED FOR THE FIRST TIME THROUGH A HISPANIC CHURCH IN SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS. WE AS WELL SERVED WITH A LOCAL CHURCH IN MISSOURI THAT SERVES A LARGE PHYSICALLY CHALLENGED POPULATION. WE ARE A VOLUNTEER DRIVEN COMMUNITY OUTREACH SEVICE AGENCY. DONATIONS FOR OUR SERVICE PROJECTS COME FROM INDIVIDUALS, BUSINESSES AND CHURCHES. ALL GIFTS AND PROCEEDS GO TO SERVE THE COMMUNITIES THAT ARE DESIGNATED. IN 2010, WE WERE ABLE TO BUILD 3 FOOD AND CLOTHING PANTRIES, ASSIST THE POOR AND UNDERPRIVILEGED IN HOME REPAIRS AND CLEANING AND ENCOURAGEMENT PROGRAMS. WE PARTICIPATED IN PREPARING AND SERVING 2100 PLUS MEALS IN THE COMMUNITIES WE SERVED. SPECIAL ATTENTION WAS PAID TO SINGLE MOTHERS, ONE PARENT FAMILIES, SENIORS AND THOSE IN NEED OF SPECIAL ASSISTANCE. IN EACH COMMUNITY WE SERVE, WE ALWAYS PARTNER WITH EXISTING SOCIAL AGENCIES, CHURCHES AND COMMUNITY PARTNERSHIPS TO BE SURE OUR EFFORTS ARE REACHING THOSE MOST IN NEED. WE ALAYS CONDUCT ONE PROJECT THAT BENEFITS EVERYONE IN THE COMMUNITY, SUCH AS PARK AND ROADSIDE CLEAN UP EFFORTS. EACH SERVICE TEAM BRINGS FOOD AND CLOTHING TO SUPPORT THE SERVICE AGENCIES ON LOCATION. WE ALSO MAKE A DIRECTED EFFORT TO PURCHASE ALL SERVICE PROJECT SUPPLIES FROM LOCAL COMMUNITY MERCHANTS, THEREBY IMPACTING THE LOCAL ECONOMY IN A POSITIVE WAY. IMH MINISTRIES INTERNATIONAL INC. ACCEPTS SERVICE PROJECTS ON RECOMMENDATIONS FROM LOCAL COMMUNITY LEADERS WITHOUT BIAS TOWARD AGE, RACE, RELIGION, NATIONAL ORIGIN, SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR POLITICAL VIEWPOINT. THIS YEAR, WE OPENED A SATELLITE OFFICE AND WORK WITH AN INDEPENDENT CONTRACT WORKERS TO EXPAND OUR SERVICE OUTREACH.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXPENSES PROMOTION 2,945 TELEPHONE 9,323 BOOKS AND JOURNALS 32 OFFICE SUPPLIES 873 INTERNET SERVICES 1,045 OFFICE EQUIPMENT 3,147 PROJECT MATERIALS,FOOD,LO 86,778 LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT 1,343 MINISTRY AND PROGRAM MATL 1,783 TOTAL 107,269
